response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value for us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a significant discount compared to its actual worth of $1,200,000 and even more than its perceived value of $800,000 to you. We are confident that this product will exceed your expectations and bring substantial benefits to you. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 950000}
